articles.author: Heinz Schenk
articles.title: Ka-ching! Career-changing payday for local players after SA20: 'Bonus bigger than salaries'
articles.description: The inaugural edition of the tournament will reward franchises with a total of R70 million in prize money in what is comfortably the most lucrative payday in domestic cricket's history.
articles.content: "That's a very good question," Wayne Parnell chuckled after he was asked what Pretoria Capitals are going to do with their runners-up cheque of R17.5 million. But between the laughs he still made the… [+2171 chars]

articles.title: Ex-England captain Morgan retires from cricket
articles.description: Former England World Cup-winning captain Eoin Morgan announces his retirement from all forms of cricket.
articles.content:
Former England captain Eoin Morgan has announced his retirement from all forms of cricket.
The 36-year-old, who was born in Dublin, stepped down from the international game last June.
Under Morgan'… [+226 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
